013package org.apache.juneau.svl;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.Utils.*;
016import java.io.*;
017import java.util.*;
018import java.util.concurrent.*;
019
020import org.apache.juneau.*;
021import org.apache.juneau.cp.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
023import org.apache.juneau.svl.vars.*;
024
025/**
026 * Utility class for resolving variables of the form <js>"$X{key}"</js> in strings.
027 *
028 * <p>
029 * Variables are of the form <c>$X{key}</c>, where <c>X</c> can consist of zero or more ASCII characters.
030 * <br>The variable key can contain anything, even nested variables that get recursively resolved.
031 *
032 * <p>
033 * Variables are defined through the {@link Builder#vars(Class[])} method.
034 *
035 * <p>
036 * The {@link Var} interface defines how variables are converted to values.
037 *
038 * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
039 * <p class='bjava'>
040 *    <jk>public class</jk> SystemPropertiesVar <jk>extends</jk> SimpleVar {
041 *
042 *       <jc>// Must have a no-arg constructor!</jc>
043 *       <jk>public</jk> SystemPropertiesVar() {
044 *          <jk>super</jk>(<js>"S"</js>);
045 *       }
046 *
047 *       <ja>@Override</ja>
048 *       <jk>public</jk> String resolve(VarResolverSession <jv>session</jv>, String <jv>value</jv>) {
049 *          <jk>return</jk> System.<jsm>getProperty</jsm>(<jv>value</jv>);
050 *       }
051 *    }
052 *
053 *    <jc>// Create a variable resolver that resolves system properties (e.g. "$S{java.home}")</jc>
054 *    VarResolver <jv>varResolver</jv> = VarResolver.<jsm>create</jsm>().vars(SystemPropertiesVar.<jk>class</jk>).build();
055 *
056 *    <jc>// Use it!</jc>
057 *    System.<jsf>out</jsf>.println(<jv>varResolver</jv>.resolve(<js>"java.home is set to $S{java.home}"</js>));
058 * </p>
059 *
060 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
061 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/SimpleVariableLanguageBasics">Simple Variable Language</a>
062
063 * </ul>
064 */
065public class VarResolver {
066
067   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
068   // Static
069   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
070
071   /**
072    * Default string variable resolver with support for system properties and environment variables:
073    *
074    * <ul>
075    *    <li><c>$S{key[,default]}</c> - {@link SystemPropertiesVar}
076    *    <li><c>$E{key[,default]}</c> - {@link EnvVariablesVar}
077    *    <li><c>$A{key[,default]}</c> - {@link ArgsVar}
078    *    <li><c>$MF{key[,default]}</c> - {@link ManifestFileVar}
079    *    <li><c>$SW{stringArg,pattern:thenValue[,pattern:thenValue...]}</c> - {@link SwitchVar}
080    *    <li><c>$IF{arg,then[,else]}</c> - {@link IfVar}
081    *    <li><c>$CO{arg[,arg2...]}</c> - {@link CoalesceVar}
082    *    <li><c>$PM{arg,pattern}</c> - {@link PatternMatchVar}
083    *    <li><c>$PR{stringArg,pattern,replace}</c>- {@link PatternReplaceVar}
084    *    <li><c>$PE{arg,pattern,groupIndex}</c> - {@link PatternExtractVar}
085    *    <li><c>$UC{arg}</c> - {@link UpperCaseVar}
086    *    <li><c>$LC{arg}</c> - {@link LowerCaseVar}
087    *    <li><c>$NE{arg}</c> - {@link NotEmptyVar}
088    *    <li><c>$LN{arg[,delimiter]}</c> - {@link LenVar}
089    *    <li><c>$ST{arg,start[,end]}</c> - {@link SubstringVar}
090    * </ul>
091    */
092   public static final VarResolver DEFAULT = create().defaultVars().build();
093
094   /**
095    * Instantiates a new clean-slate {@link Builder} object.
096    *
097    * @return A new {@link Builder} object.
098    */
099   public static Builder create() {
100      return new Builder();
101   }
102
103   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
104   // Builder
105   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
106
107   /**
108    * Builder class.
109    */
110   @FluentSetters
111   public static class Builder extends BeanBuilder<VarResolver> {
112
113      final VarList vars;
114
115      /**
116       * Constructor.
117       */
118      protected Builder() {
119         super(VarResolver.class, BeanStore.create().build());
120         vars = VarList.create();
121      }
122
123      /**
124       * Copy constructor.
125       *
126       * @param copyFrom The bean to copy from.
127       */
128      protected Builder(VarResolver copyFrom) {
129         super(copyFrom.getClass(), copyFrom.beanStore);
130         vars = VarList.of(copyFrom.vars);
131      }
132
133      @Override /* BeanBuilder */
134      protected VarResolver buildDefault() {
135         return new VarResolver(this);
136      }
137
138      //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
139      // Properties
140      //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
141
142      /**
143       * Register new variables with this resolver.
144       *
145       * @param values
146       *    The variable resolver classes.
147       *    These classes must subclass from {@link Var} and have no-arg constructors.
148       * @return This object .
149       */
150      @SafeVarargs
151      public final Builder vars(Class<? extends Var>...values) {
152         vars.append(values);
153         return this;
154      }
155
156      /**
157       * Register new variables with this resolver.
158       *
159       * @param values
160       *    The variable resolver classes.
161       *    These classes must subclass from {@link Var} and have no-arg constructors.
162       * @return This object .
163       */
164      public Builder vars(Var...values) {
165         vars.append(values);
166         return this;
167      }
168
169      /**
170       * Register new variables with this resolver.
171       *
172       * @param values
173       *    The variable resolver classes.
174       *    These classes must subclass from {@link Var} and have no-arg constructors.
175       * @return This object .
176       */
177      public Builder vars(VarList values) {
178         vars.append(values);
179         return this;
180      }
181
182      /**
183       * Adds the default variables to this builder.
184       *
185       * <p>
186       * The default variables are:
187       * <ul>
188       *    <li>{@link SystemPropertiesVar}
189       *    <li>{@link EnvVariablesVar}
190       *    <li>{@link ArgsVar}
191       *    <li>{@link ManifestFileVar}
192       *    <li>{@link SwitchVar}
193       *    <li>{@link IfVar}
194       *    <li>{@link CoalesceVar}
195       *    <li>{@link PatternMatchVar}
196       *    <li>{@link PatternReplaceVar}
197       *    <li>{@link PatternExtractVar}
198       *    <li>{@link UpperCaseVar}
199       *    <li>{@link LowerCaseVar}
200       *    <li>{@link NotEmptyVar}
201       *    <li>{@link LenVar}
202       *    <li>{@link SubstringVar}
203       * </ul>
204       *
205       * @return This object .
206       */
207      public Builder defaultVars() {
208         vars.addDefault();
209         return this;
210      }
211
212      /**
213       * Adds a bean to the bean store in this session.
214       *
215       * @param <T> The bean type.
216       * @param c The bean type.
217       * @param value The bean.
218       * @return This object .
219       */
220      public <T> Builder bean(Class<T> c, T value) {
221         beanStore().addBean(c, value);
222         return this;
223      }
224
225      // <FluentSetters>
226
227      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanBuilder */
228      public Builder impl(Object value) {
229         super.impl(value);
230         return this;
231      }
232
233      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanBuilder */
234      public Builder type(Class<?> value) {
235         super.type(value);
236         return this;
237      }
238
239      // </FluentSetters>
240   }
241
242   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
243   // Instance
244   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
245
246   final Var[] vars;
247   private final Map<String,Var> varMap;
248   final BeanStore beanStore;
249
250   /**
251    * Constructor.
252    *
253    * @param builder The builder for this object.
254    */
255   protected VarResolver(Builder builder) {
256      this.vars = builder.vars.stream().map(x -> toVar(builder.beanStore(),x)).toArray(Var[]::new);
257
258      Map<String,Var> m = new ConcurrentSkipListMap<>();
259      for (Var v : vars)
260         m.put(v.getName(), v);
261
262      this.varMap = u(m);
263      this.beanStore = BeanStore.of(builder.beanStore());
264   }
265
266   private static Var toVar(BeanStore bs, Object o) {
267      if (o instanceof Class)
268         return bs.createBean(Var.class).type((Class<?>)o).run();
269      return (Var)o;
270   }
271
272   /**
273    * Returns a new builder object using the settings in this resolver as a base.
274    *
275    * @return A new var resolver builder.
276    */
277   public Builder copy() {
278      return new Builder(this);
279   }
280
281   /**
282    * Returns an unmodifiable map of {@link Var Vars} associated with this context.
283    *
284    * @return A map whose keys are var names (e.g. <js>"S"</js>) and values are {@link Var} instances.
285    */
286   protected Map<String,Var> getVarMap() {
287      return varMap;
288   }
289
290   /**
291    * Returns an array of variables define in this variable resolver context.
292    *
293    * @return A new array containing the variables in this context.
294    */
295   protected Var[] getVars() {
296      return Arrays.copyOf(vars, vars.length);
297   }
298
299   /**
300    * Adds a bean to this session.
301    *
302    * @param <T> The bean type.
303    * @param c The bean type.
304    * @param value The bean.
305    * @return This object .
306    */
307   public <T> VarResolver addBean(Class<T> c, T value) {
308      beanStore.addBean(c, value);
309      return this;
310   }
311
312   /**
313    * Creates a new resolver session with no session objects.
314    *
315    * @return A new resolver session.
316    */
317   public VarResolverSession createSession() {
318      return new VarResolverSession(this, null);
319   }
320
321   /**
322    * Same as {@link #createSession()} except allows you to specify a bean store for resolving beans.
323    *
324    * @param beanStore The bean store to associate with this session.
325    * @return A new resolver session.
326    */
327   public VarResolverSession createSession(BeanStore beanStore) {
328      return new VarResolverSession(this, beanStore);
329   }
330
331   /**
332    * Resolve variables in the specified string.
333    *
334    * <p>
335    * This is a shortcut for calling <code>createSession(<jk>null</jk>).resolve(s);</code>.
336    * <br>This method can only be used if the string doesn't contain variables that rely on the existence of session
337    * variables.
338    *
339    * @param s The input string.
340    * @return The string with variables resolved, or the same string if it doesn't contain any variables to resolve.
341    */
342   public String resolve(String s) {
343      return createSession(null).resolve(s);
344   }
345
346   /**
347    * Resolve variables in the specified string and sends the results to the specified writer.
348    *
349    * <p>
350    * This is a shortcut for calling <code>createSession(<jk>null</jk>).resolveTo(s, w);</code>.
351    * <br>This method can only be used if the string doesn't contain variables that rely on the existence of session
352    * variables.
353    *
354    * @param s The input string.
355    * @param w The writer to send the result to.
356    * @throws IOException Thrown by underlying stream.
357    */
358   public void resolveTo(String s, Writer w) throws IOException {
359      createSession(null).resolveTo(s, w);
360   }
361}
